/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, providing a driver's perspective of the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Power lines crisscross above, forming a network of connections against the clear blue sky. Cars and buses move along the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a soft light. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the energy and movement of the city.
